rendered: The OnePlus 5T is really a fantastic phone. The phone's available colors are Black, Red and White. This phone has a display with a physical size of 6 inches and a screen-to-body ratio of 80.43 % along with a battery of 3,300 mAh.

The OnePlus 5 is really a fantastic phone. The phone has a battery of 3,300 mAh. This phone has a display with a physical size of 5.5 inches and a screen-to-body ratio of 72.93 %. The phone's available colors are Gold and Gray.

The OnePlus 3T is really a fantastic phone. The phone's available colors are Black, Gold and Gray. This phone has a battery of 3,400 mAh. It has a display with a physical size of 5.5 inches and a screen-to-body ratio of 73.15 %.
